resources.generalconfigTitleHelpText: Set preferences for your hero banner
resources.timeSwitchImageHelpText: The amount of seconds before a image changes - Default: 4
resources.boolLoopCarouselHelpText: After all images, will the carousel start over? Default: false
resources.boolAutoPlayCarouselHelpText: The carousel should start changing images at page load? Default: true
resources.imageTitle1HelpText: Upload images and define texts and links for image 1
resources.mobileImageUrl1HelpText: Upload or define an mobile version for image 1
resources.bannerLink1HelpText: Define a link for image 1 - optional feature
resources.startDate1HelpText: Define a start date, pattern YYYYMMDD. If your image has no start date, it will be active since upload.
resources.endDate1HelpText: Define a end date, pattern YYYYMMDD. If your image has no end date, it will be active forever.
resources.bannerText1HelpText: Type a text for image 1 - optional feature
